segments.text: What ? Your diamond ring is lost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I just cannot find it anywhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It must have been stolen by the few thieves . I ’ ll get it back for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are risking your neck . Don ’ t you know they have guns .
segments.speaker: S2
